attributes.action: Mp's should be prosecuted for defrauding the public with non essential expence claims.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP's are voted in to serve the public, when they spend public money to feather their own nests, they are no longer trustworthy and should be dismissed as they would be in any other company.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
